author: Anthony Esposito
description: The United States and Mexico pledged to step up efforts to beat the growing threat of fentanyl, a synthetic opiate up to 50 times more lethal than heroin blamed for the deaths of thousands of people in recent years, including rock star Prince.
title: U.S., Mexico bolster efforts to combat deadly tide of fentanyl

author: Harrison Jacobs
description: Approximately 80% of heroin used at Insite in Vancouver from July 2016 to March 2017 had been contaminated with fentanyl.
title: A legal drug 50 times as strong as heroin is contaminating street drugs more than ever
